directions: Blend coconut oil, cocoa butter, and sweetener in a food processor until creamy, about 2 minutes. Fill mini muffin cups with mixture and chill in the refrigerator until set, about 30 minutes.
ingredients: ½ cup melted white cocoa butter
½ teaspoon low-calorie natural sweetener (such as Swerve®)
title: White Chocolate Nut-Free Keto and Vegan Fat Bombs
